name: Yao Rui Education Information Inc.
description:
With our mission"Learn Free", we see a world without closed doors, where everyone could obtain the best educational resources for free. We are a dedicated non-profit company that commits itself into hosting, translating, providing, and supporting all OER. We are 100% commited to the OCW cause and we would love to work together with other OERs to speed up the process of the entire OER movement in the world, starting China. 
Since we have started developing our OER website last year, our website has incorporated both OER and SNS elements. We are going to have our website up and running by Feb 10th 2011. We aim to be the largest OER provider/host in China that provides the most accurate translation for the contents, as well as most up to date OERs.
